rounds.interlude: Jemima dimly lights the final rung, promising a glittering leap to the million as the last answers fall into place.

beats: Jemima swaps quiz cards for neon tokens and powers up pixelated jackpots.
She watches twin players chase tickets with synchronized joystick jabs.
A jackpot siren blares as glowing ladders flash above their heads.
She cashes out the tickets and wonders how they convert to the grand prize.
questions: The duo wins 180 tickets in round three and triple that in round four. How many tickets total do they have?
Each prize bundle costs 45 tickets. How many full bundles can they claim with their total tickets?
